remarks: The mapping from fiducial atom to set of translations.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
trnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trnset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
trnset.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
trnset.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
trnset.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
trnset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
trnset.l $e |- L = ( Dil ` K ) $.
trnset.t $e |- T = ( Trn ` K ) $.
trnfsetN $p |- ( K e. C -> T = ( d e. A |-> { f e. ( L ` d ) | A. q e. ( W ` d ) A. r e. ( W ` d ) ( ( q .+ ( f ` q ) ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { d } ) ) = ( ( r .+ ( f ` r ) ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { d } ) ) } ) ) $.
$d A d $.
$d K d f q r $.
$d L f $.
$d W q r $.
